TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WS2007HttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding

remarks.para: The class adds a system-provided binding similar to but uses the Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) standard versions of the , , and protocols. No changes to the object model or default settings are required when using this binding.

summary.para: Represents an interoperable binding that derives from and provides support for the updated versions of the , , and binding elements.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes an instance of the class and sets the , , and properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode mode, bool reliableSessionEnabled) cil managed

remarks.para: This constructor initializes an instance of the class and sets the , , and properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.

Docs.param: true if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, false.
